me.joeycumines.javapromises.core

Interface PromiseTyped<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PromiseBase, PromiseRunnable

    public interface PromiseTyped<T>
    A convenience, that allows you to simply add this to your Promise implementation as an interface, giving you the ability to have strict typing on the return type of then. This design circumvents type erasure.

    NOTE: Any changes to this should also be made to Promise, where relevant.

    • Method Detail

      • getPromise

        Promise getPromise()
        Get this as a promise. Implementations MUST return this, which means that they must implement both Promise and PromiseTyped.
        Returns:
        This as a Promise.
